description: The applicant or respondent of an application

synonym.description: Provides the additional business persona of an applicant or respondent e.g. appellant, complainant, appellee, suspect

summonsRequired.description: Indicates if this party is required to be summonsed.  Typically applies to the subject of the application

notificationRequired.description: Indicates if this party is required to be notified of the application proceedings

appointmentNotificationRequired.description: Indicates if this party is required to be notified of the application proceedings that are planned by telephone appointment.  Typically applies to the subject of the application

personDetails.description: Provided when the party is a person

organisation.description: Provided when the party is an organisation

organisationPersons.description: Provided when the party is an organisation

prosecutingAuthority.description: Provided when the party is a prosecutingAuthority for a linked case

defendant.description: Provided when the party is a defendant for a linked case

representationOrganisation.description: The organisation details of the appointed representation
